record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - July 23, 2007)

[Page: S9792]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Ann Clough, a fellow in my office, be granted floor privileges during the consideration of S. 1642, the Higher Education Amendments Act.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the following interns be given floor privileges for the duration of this debate: Kelly Shepherd, Christopher Schmidt, and Shannon Saltclah.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
